name: Good fruit
description:
This is a simple casual game. The main content is to cut off various fruits that constantly pop up on the screen, which requires players to move quickly and accurately. Once the bomb is cut, the game ends.

Game Features

1. Don't be impatient, wait until the fruits are connected in a straight line before cutting

2. If a pile of fruits is thrown at the same time, start with the smaller ones because they fall faster and can be cut more accurately

3. Use more cross cutting and minimize vertical cutting as much as possible

4. With more practice, you can also become a master

Game Features

Easy to operate and get started;

Exquisite graphics and realistic effects;

Multiple fruits with different visual effects
